examples.example: 我们应该多去尝试别的新鲜事物，拓展自己的视野和思维。

translate.english: We should try more other new things to expand our horizons and thinking.

examples.example: 我很喜欢这个地方，但我也想去看看别的美丽风景。

translate.english: I like this place very much, but I also want to go to see other beautiful scenery.

examples.example: 我们不能只关注眼前，还应该去寻找别的机会来提升自己。

translate.english: We cannot only focus on the present, but also should look for other opportunities to improve ourselves.
